answer:
Please contact your local health unit or immunization provider to find out which product was used for your baby. You can find out the number of the public health unit here.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:

You can find out the number of the public health unit here.

question: Hi, my baby is getting her 4 months vaccination in China. And the doctor is asking what is the manufacturer/brand of the Rotavirus since he says the brand needs to match. Thanks!
question_variation_0: what is the manufacturer of a rotavirus
